definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
(of an actor) to bring (one's character) to life/to act brilliantly
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
